explanation: The home function serves as the entry point for the main page.
It interacts with the BlogPost model to manage blog entries.
Handles form submissions for creating new blog posts.
response.hook: Explore the home route handling GET and POST requests.
response.next_click: View the BlogPost model for details on data structure.
response.pitfall: Ensure form validation is correctly implemented to avoid errors.
response.title: GET|POST /
response.why_it_matters: Understanding this route is crucial for managing user interactions on the homepage.
